The PSU's IP address if the PSU is currently logged in with the TPP.

The time when the PSU last logged in with the TPP. All dates in the HTTP headers are represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates. An example is below: Sun, 10 Sep 2017 19:43:31 UTC pattern: '^(Mon|Tue|Wed|Thu|Fri|Sat|Sun), \d{2} (Jan|Feb|Mar|Apr|May|Jun|Jul|Aug|Sep|Oct|Nov|Dec) \d{4} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} (GMT|UTC)$'
An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.

(Required) Every request will be processed only once per x-idempotency-key.  The
Idempotency Key will be valid for 24 hours.
